## TouchController class

Joystick for touch operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TouchController 
```

## Example


```ts
import * as THREE from "three";
import { TouchController } from "three-touch-controller";

const playerEl:Object3D = ...;
const touchController = new TouchController(playerEl);

...
const clock = new THREE.Clock();
renderer.setAnimationLoop(() => {
  const dt = clock.getDelta();
  touchController.tick(dt);
});
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [enabled](./three-touch-controller.touchcontroller.enabled.md) |  | boolean | When set to false, Will not respond to controls. Default is true. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./three-touch-controller.touchcontroller.dispose.md) |  | Releases all resources allocated by this instance. |
|  [tick(deltaTime)](./three-touch-controller.touchcontroller.tick.md) |  | Must be called periodically. |
